channel.title: Coding on Arthur Gao
channel.description: Recent content in Coding on Arthur Gao

item.title: kard
item.description: The kard project gave me an opportunity to further developed my leadership skills.

item.title: National Stiltwalkers of Canada: Bamcussion
item.description: Bamcussion presented a unique challenge to me. I had the opportunity to meld my video expertise with my coding experience developing a live rendered background for a greenscreen production.

item.title: ARC180 Projects
item.description: The ARC180 course allowed me to view computation and its uses in a new light.

item.title: 24 Game
item.description: To make a long story short, my family has a family loves road trips and one of the things we love to do on these trips is a game called twenty-four.

item.title: Scona Scoreboard Software
item.description: The Scona Scoreboard Software is a suite of software that connected the existing (name) scoreboard in the gymnasium to a score bug that we overlayed on the live broadcast.
